english.segment1: Hey, it's me trying to get closer. But feeling like a chump instead, Is it in my head?. Can I be what you want me to be?. You can walk away so far and I'll be there. Buckle me up, let's go for a ride. It's a mystery what's inside. Give to me what you've been hiding. Or just hurt me. You can let me fall and I'll get up for sure
english.segment2: I'm on the wrong side of my head.
